content:
Intents:
- id: TRA16897 
  description: Training requirements for the job role, including any specific courses or certifications needed.
- id: ONB79315
  description: Onboarding process, including any paperwork, orientation sessions, or other activities involved.
- id: POL34527 
  description: Company policies relevant to the employee's job role, such as code of conduct, safety procedures, or data protection guidelines.
- id: SAF85215
  description: Workplace safety protocols, such as emergency procedures, fire drills, or health and safety regulations.
- id: ITA45632
  description: Accessing IT systems, including passwords, software licenses, or virtual private network (VPN) setup.

Entities:
- access_type: password, license, VPN

For the following query, please classify any intents and entities found.  Output your findings in YAML, one for intents and another for entities.

As part of my onboarding I need access to the CMDB data. How request VPN access? Is there any other training or access I require for my job role?

You know I have really found this whole onboarding thing such a drag.  I kind of wish we didn't really have to complete it.  I had so many other things I could have been doing. Even missed my kid's piano performance to try and get this done.  He was playing Chopin.  Did you know that the Piano Concerto No. 1 in E minor, Op. 11, is a piano concerto written by Frédéric Chopin in 1830, when he was twenty years old. It was first performed on 12 October of that year, at the Teatr Narodowy in Warsaw, Poland, with the composer as soloist, during one of his "farewell" concerts before leaving Poland. Next he gets to play some piece by an American composer.  I think Joplin.  "The Entertainer" is a 1902 classic piano rag written by Scott Joplin. It was sold first as sheet music by John Stark & Son of St. Louis, Missouri, and in the 1910s as piano rolls that would play on player pianos.

chosen:
Intents:
- ITA45632: Accessing IT systems, including passwords, software licenses, or virtual private network (VPN) setup.
- TRA16897: Training requirements for the job role, including any specific courses or certifications needed.

Entities:
- access_type: VPN
rejected:
-   id: ONB79315
     description: Onboarding process
     entities: {}

 -   id: ITA45632
     description: Requesting VPN access
     entities:
         access_type: VPN

To gain further insights into additional trainings or access you may require for your job role, please provide more context about the job role itself. Additional information would be required to answer this question.
